name: Branch Naming Convention

on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, edited, synchronize]

jobs:
  check-branch-naming:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Check branch naming convention
        run: |
          BRANCH_NAME="${{ github.head_ref }}"
          echo "ğŸ” Checking branch name: $BRANCH_NAME"

          if [[ $BRANCH_NAME =~ ^(feature|bugfixes|patch|hotfixes|task)\/[a-z0-9-]+$ ]]; then
            echo "âœ… Branch name follows convention"
            echo "ğŸ“‹ Type: $(echo $BRANCH_NAME | cut -d'/' -f1)"
            echo "ğŸ“ Description: $(echo $BRANCH_NAME | cut -d'/' -f2)"
          else
            echo "âŒ Branch name does not follow convention"
            echo ""
            echo "ğŸš¨ Expected format: type/description-with-hyphens"
            echo ""
            echo "ğŸ“‹ Valid types:"
            echo "  ğŸŒŸ feature/    - New features and enhancements"
            echo "  ğŸ› bugfixes/   - Bug fixes and error corrections"
            echo "  ğŸ©¹ patch/      - Minor improvements and updates"
            echo "  ğŸš¨ hotfixes/   - Critical production issues"
            echo "  ğŸ“‹ task/       - Development tasks and refactoring"
            echo ""
            echo "âœ… Valid examples:"
            echo "  - feature/add-validation-methods"
            echo "  - bugfixes/fix-timestamp-overflow"
            echo "  - patch/update-dependencies"
            echo "  - hotfixes/security-vulnerability"
            echo "  - task/refactor-test-suite"
            echo ""
            echo "âŒ Invalid examples:"
            echo "  - Feature/NewMethod (use lowercase)"
            echo "  - fix-bug (missing type prefix)"
            echo "  - feature/add new method (no spaces)"
            echo "  - bugfix/issue (use 'bugfixes' not 'bugfix')"
            exit 1
          fi

  validate-pr-content:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Validate PR title and description
        run: |
          PR_TITLE="${{ github.event.pull_request.title }}"
          PR_BODY="${{ github.event.pull_request.body }}"

          echo "ğŸ” Validating PR content..."
          echo "ğŸ“ Title: $PR_TITLE"

          # Check if title follows conventional commit format
          if [[ $PR_TITLE =~ ^(feat|fix|docs|test|refactor|perf|chore)(\(.+\))?: .+ ]]; then
            echo "âœ… PR title follows conventional commit format"
          else
            echo "âš ï¸  PR title should follow conventional commit format"
            echo "   Example: 'feat: add new validation method'"
          fi

          # Check if description contains required sections
          if [[ $PR_BODY == *"## Description"* ]] && [[ $PR_BODY == *"## Type of Change"* ]]; then
            echo "âœ… PR description contains required sections"
          else
            echo "âš ï¸  Please use the PR template with required sections"
          fi
